statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE user_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';

SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'user' AND username LIKE 'j%';

SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' OR role = 'manager' ORDER BY user_id ASC;

SELECT * FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.user_id;
SELECT username, permission_name FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.user_id;

SELECT * FROM users WHERE id > 1000 ORDER BY username DESC;

SELECT role_name, description FROM roles INNER JOIN user_roles ON roles.role_id = user_roles.role_id WHERE user_roles.user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 4 AND user_id = 5;
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id > 3 AND permission_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM Roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';

SELECT username, role_name, permission_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id JOIN RolePermissions ON Roles.role_id = RolePermissions.role_id JOIN Permissions ON RolePermissions.permission_id = Permissions.permission_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(user_id) AS max_user_id FROM Users GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT role_name, COUNT(role_name) AS role_count FROM Roles GROUP BY role_name ORDER BY role_count DESC;
